TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ModelItem extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged
Public MustInherit Class ModelItem Implements INotifyPropertyChanged

summary.span: 表示编辑模型中的单个项。

span.span: Represents a single item in the editing model.

summary.span: 项可以为从复杂的数据结构直至颜色或整数的任何内容。

span.span: An item can be anything from a complex data structure down to a color or integer.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 创建 类的新实例。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 获取在此项上声明的特性。

span.span: Gets the attributes declared on this item.

value.span: 一个包含项特性的集合。

span.span: A collection that contains the attributes of the item.

summary.span: 打开设计器的编辑范围。

span.span: Opens an editing scope for the designer.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelEditingScope BeginEdit() cil managed
Public MustOverride Function BeginEdit () As ModelEditingScope

summary.span: 打开设计器的编辑范围。

span.span: Opens an editing scope for the designer.

summary.span: 打开编辑范围后，所有对象之间的所有更改将保存到该范围中，直至事务完成或还原为止。

span.span: After an editing scope is open, all changes across all objects will be saved into the scope until the transaction is completed or reverted.

summary.span: 编辑范围可以嵌套，但必须按顺序提交。

span.span: Editing scopes can be nested, but must be committed in order.
A , which must be either completed or reverted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 编辑范围允许将对模型所做的多个更改作为单个事务应用。An editing scope allows multiple changes to the model to be applied as a single transaction. 在事务完成之前，可以随时还原在编辑范围内进行的所有更改。All of the changes made within the editing scope can be reverted at any time before the transaction is completed. 编辑范围对于设计器是全局性的。Editing scopes are global to the designer. 可以为设计器中的任何项创建编辑范围；您无需为所更改的特定项创建编辑范围。An editing scope can be created for any item in the designer; you do not need to create an editing scope for the specific item you are changing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 编辑范围允许将对模型所做的多个更改作为单个事务应用。An editing scope allows multiple changes to the model to be applied as a single transaction. 在事务完成之前，可以随时还原在编辑范围内进行的所有更改。All of the changes made within the editing scope can be reverted at any time before the transaction is completed. 编辑范围对于设计器是全局性的。Editing scopes are global to the designer. 可以为设计器中的任何项创建编辑范围；您无需为所更改的特定项创建编辑范围。An editing scope can be created for any item in the designer; you do not need to create an editing scope for the specific item you are changing.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object GetCurrentValue() cil managed
Public MustOverride Function GetCurrentValue () As Object

summary.span: 返回 所包装的基础模型对象的当前值。

span.span: Returns the current value of the underlying model object that the is wrapping.

returns.span: 作为 所包装的基础模型对象的当前值。

span.span: The current value of the underlying model object that the is wrapping as an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以检查此对象，但不应对其进行任何更改。You can inspect this object, but you should not make any changes to it. 对返回的对象进行的更改将不会合并到设计器中。Changes made to the object returned will not be incorporated into the designer. 方法可返回对象的现有实例或新的克隆实例。The method can return either an existing or new cloned instance of the object.

span.span: Gets the type of object that the item represents.

value.span: 返回项所表示的对象的类型。

span.span: The type of object that the item represents.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract string Name { get; set; }
Public MustOverride Property Name As String
public: abstract property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Name : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置项的名称或 ID 。

span.span: Gets or sets the name or ID of the item.

value.span: 为 的类的名称或 ID。

span.span: The name or ID of the item as a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不是所有项都需要具有名称，因此这可能会返回`null`。Not all items need to have names, so this might return `null`. 根据项的类型以及它在层次结构中所处的位置，在项上设置 可能并非总是合法的。Depending on the type of item and where it sits in the hierarchy, it might not always be legal to set the on an item. 如果此项声明`RuntimeNamePropertyAttribute`、属性是直接映射到该特性所指定的属性。If the of this item declares a `RuntimeNamePropertyAttribute`, the property is a direct mapping to the property dictated by that attribute.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property Parent As ModelItem

summary.span: 获取返回作为此项的父级的项。

span.span: Gets the item that is the parent of this item.

value.span: 一个表示此项的父级的 。

span.span: A that is the parent of this item.

value.span: 如果项包含在集合或字典中，则改为返回拥有该集合或字典的对象。

span.span: If an item is contained in a collection or dictionary, the object that owns the collection or dictionary is returned instead.

The parents of this item.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property Properties As ModelPropertyCollection

summary.span: 设置此项上的公共属性。

span.span: Gets the public properties on this item.

value.span: 包含此项的公共属性的 。

span.span: A that contains the public properties of this item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根据附加的属性或对编辑范围的更改，返回的属性集可能会发生更改。The set of properties returned might change based on attached properties or changes to the editing scope.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride Event PropertyChanged As PropertyChangedEventHandler

summary.span: 实现 。

span.span: Implements .

summary.span: 使用此事件来侦听对模型所做的更改。

span.span: Use this event to listen for changes to the model.

summary.span: WPF 的数据绑定功能也使用此事件。

span.span: This is also used by the data binding features of WPF.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 完成这些事件后，将它们与项断开连接。Disconnect events from items when you are finished with them. 否则，可能会使垃圾回收器无法释放不再使用的项。Otherwise, you might prevent the garbage collector from disposing of an item that is no longer in use.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property Root As ModelItem

summary.span: 获取返回作为此树的根的项。

span.span: Gets the item that is the root of this tree.

value.span: 一个作为此树的根的 ；或者，如果此项不是树的一部分，则为 。

span.span: A that is the root of this tree, or if this item is not part of a tree.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property Source As ModelProperty

summary.span: 获取提供此值的属性。

span.span: Gets the property that provided this value.
A that indicates the source of this value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果该项表示的对象关系图的根，这将返回`null`。If the item represents the root of the object graph, this will return `null`. 如果项是集合或字典的成员，则从 Source 返回的属性将是由该集合或字典提供的伪属性。If an item is a member of a collection or dictionary, the property returned from Source will be a pseudo-property provided by the collection or dictionary. 对于其他值，Source 属性返回在其中实际设置值的属性。For other values, the Source property returns the property where the value was actually set. 因此，如果某个值正在被继承，则 Source 允许您找出谁最初提供了该值。Therefore, if a value is being inherited, Source allows you to find out who originally provided the value.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property Sources As IEnumerable(Of ModelProperty)

summary.span: 获取保存此值的所有属性。

span.span: Gets all the properties that hold this value.
The sources of this value.
